import React from"react";import'./Button.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const STYLES=['btn--primary','btn--outline'];const SIZES=['btn--medium','btn--large'];export const Button=_ref=>{let{children,type,onClick,buttonStyle,buttonSize}=_ref;const checkButtonStyle=STYLES.includes(buttonStyle)?buttonStyle:STYLES[0];const checkButtonSize=SIZES.includes(buttonSize)?buttonSize:SIZES[0];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`btn ${checkButtonStyle} ${checkButtonSize}`,onClick:onClick,type:type,children:children});};
